name: keenanpayne
description: The personal website for Keenan Payne.

scripts.build: watch "npm run build:sass && npm run build:minify" src
scripts.build:watchnodesass: watch "npm run build:nodesass && npm run build:minify" src
scripts.build:nodesass: node-sass --output-style=expanded src/site.scss dist/site.css | postcss --use autoprefixer < dist/site.css -b "last 2 versions" | cssmin > dist/site.min.css
